content: skill level easy pattern includes directions for crocheted chicks and knit/felted basket 1 **chicks** materials 1 ball berroco plush 50 grs in color of your choice note 6 chicks can be made from 1 ball we used colors #1944 sprout #1924 jazzy turquoise #1947 bubblegum #1922 pasty purple and #1971 banana crochet hook size 6 50 mm k black permanent marker 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/chicks--basket-basket
